AngelSense Helps Children with Special Needs
Enjoy a Safe & Independent Life

Wandering or Running Off

Your child’s safety is of highest importance, and safety precautions should be taken to prevent wandering. Alerts for unexpected locations are sent immediately to your phone, and the 'Runner Mode' feature drastically reduces the time to find a lost child. AngelSense assures your child is safe and secure at all times.

Oppositional Behavior

A review of the individual’s behavior during a typical day, at home or at school, can help identify an event that may have triggered non-compliant behavior. The 'Listen-In' feature enables you to sense your child's condition, and make sure he or she is not neglected, mistreated or being bullied.

Changes in Adulthood

A major concern is encouraging your child to have a fully independent life, and feel comfortable with daily activities such as shopping or using public transportation. Allow your child to go out and experience an independent routine, and monitor his or her routes and locations throughout the day. Gain peace of mind knowing your child is at the right place at the right time.

 

AngelSense Solution

A GPS tracking device and voice-monitoring solution designed for the special needs community. Every feature has been tailored to address a specific challenge encountered by the special needs community and assure the family will gain peace of mind.

Order now

Unique AngelSense Capabilities

Alerts for Unexpected Locations

Receive text alerts for every unexpected location your child visits

Listen-In

Listen to your child environment from anywhere and at any time

Diary Schedule

See your child’s routes and locations throughout the day

Smart Search

Track your child in case of an emergency using a unique 'Runner Mode'

Non-Removable Wearables

GPS wearables that address sensory sensitivities of special children

Missing Child Alert

Powerful feature designed to get the help of others to find a missing child
